idea-plugin.name: base16 PaperColor Dark
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 PaperColor Dark for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Jon Leopard (http://github.com/jonleopard), Tinted Theming (https://github.com/tinted-theming), based on PaperColor Theme (https://github.com/NLKNguyen/papercolor-theme). Theme made by Tinted Theming (https://github.com/tinted-theming/base16-jetbrains)
